blogPost.title: Vladimir Putin still commands the television channels that helped him to come to power, but it is Alexei Navalny who dominates politics on Russia’s internet https://t.co/Euh24mdBmt
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 弗拉基米尔-普京仍然指挥着帮助他上台的电视频道，但在俄罗斯互联网上主导政治的是阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼https://t.co/Euh24mdBmt。
弗拉基米爾-普京仍然指揮着幫助他上臺的電視頻道，但在俄羅斯互聯網上主導政治的是阿列克謝-納瓦爾尼https://t.co/Euh24mdBmt。

previous.title: What will happen to the Republican Party? @CindyMcCain, a member of the Biden-Harris transition advisory council and widow of Republican Senator John McCain, tells “The Economist Asks” podcast “this party may split” https://t.co/O2OPCdWFNr https://t.co/VYDEzxyppQ

localize.full_text: 共和党会发生什么？拜登-哈里斯过渡顾问委员会成员、共和党参议员约翰-麦凯恩的遗孀@辛迪-麦凯恩告诉《经济学家问》播客 "这个党可能会分裂" https://t.co/O2OPCdWFNr https://t.co/VYDEzxyppQ。
共和黨會發生什麼？拜登-哈里斯過渡顧問委員會成員、共和黨參議員約翰-麥凱恩的遺孀@辛迪-麥凱恩告訴《經濟學家問》播客 "這個黨可能會分裂" https://t.co/O2OPCdWFNr https://t.co/VYDEzxyppQ。

next.title: “Biden is ahead of pace of all his seven predecessors.” On “Checks and Balance”, @kdtenpas says the new president’s speed in staffing his administration will help him deal with the multiple crises he faces https://t.co/npv2K2n2l7

localize.full_text: "拜登的步伐比他的七位前任都要快。" 在 "检查与平衡 "节目中，@kdtenpas表示，新总统为政府配备人员的速度将有助于他应对面临的多重危机https://t.co/npv2K2n2l7。
"拜登的步伐比他的七位前任都要快。" 在 "檢查與平衡 "節目中，@kdtenpas表示，新總統爲政府配備人員的速度將有助於他應對面臨的多重危機https://t.co/npv2K2n2l7。
